briefdescription.para: Implementation of temperature sensor abstraction layer.

detaileddescription.para:
Claude Code Session 20250720_221011
2025-01-20
Implements unified sensor interface for DS18B20 and PT1000 temperature sensors with error handling, temperature tracking, and alarm management.

listitem.para: DS18B20: OneWire digital sensors on GPIO pins
PT1000: RTD sensors with MAX31865 on SPI bus
